title: Gevalia logo Font ID
content:
Please help identify the Gevalia logo

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2013-07-19 at 9.15.01 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821124407/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-07-19%20at%209.15.01%20PM.png) | 82.44 KB |
author: lizkelly27

comments.content: Please help identify the Gevalia logo

If it's a single font, I don't recognize it. You can see some fonts with a similar structure by doing a MyFonts search for flare serif or tiny serif. The cross stroke on the A matches a reverse of the A cross stroke in [ITC Benguiat](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821124407/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-benguiat/).  
Don
